nodes.text: Count of Serenno was a title held by Dooku of House Serenno as count of the planet Serenno, with his father Gora and his brother Ramil, who lost the title with the invasion of Serenno, having held the title previously. During a dinner between the two of them, Wilhuff Tarkin once referred to Dooku by this title. Dooku continued to hold the title until his death during the Battle of Coruscant. The cape Dooku wore was the emblem of the Count of Serenno. In 10 BBY, Chrodber served as the Count of Serenno and was present aboard the First Light, a yacht owned by Crimson Dawn crime lord Dryden Vos.
List of known Counts of Serenno
The Count of Serenno title first appeared through Dooku in the 2002 film Star Wars: Episode II Attack of the Clones, the second installment of the Star Wars prequel trilogy.
